Education.title: Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp
Education.description: Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp at Uconn. This bootcamp covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and more. It includes hands-on projects and real-world applications to build a portfolio.

Education.title: Some college in Computer Science
Education.description: Pursuing a degree in Computer Science with a focus on software development and programming languages. Courses include data structures, algorithms, and web development.
